page.title: 03Fashion in Elgin
page.content: Fashions in Elgin are changing quickly.Some people like lots of different colours that clash,some only a certian amount that match,and others like blacks and dark colours.Skirts aren't worn as much as trousers(unless there so tight you can hardly walk)And of course they are worn to school.Ski pants are realy tight cotton trousers almost like tights with a strap to go round the bottom of the foot.Shoe with thin heels are very popular with young people,and so are lightweight flat ones.Hairstyles are sometimes pretty unusal.There are spikey styles,rather at the top front or sides.Some people dye their hair,there is a whole range of colours.People usually dye it browns and reds but a few people are more adventurous and dye theirs greens blues,and pinks.
